role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something
instrument or manner, if separate from agent

example.name: autogen1
example.text: our use and disposal of precious natural resources

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the discontinued operations and disposal of its Fine Homes International Limited Partnership real-estate subsidiary
example.arg: of its Fine Homes International Limited Partnership real-estate subsidiary

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The Bush administration has at its disposal $ 273 million in funds remaining from the $ 1.1 billion Congress released for the cleanup after Hurricane Hugo .
example.arg: $ 273 million in funds remaining from the $ 1.1 billion Congress released for the cleanup after Hurricane Hugo

example.name: autogen2
example.text: the city has 1,000 hospital beds at its disposal
